meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or enjoyable for playing.
meanings.sent1: The playability of the new game made it a hit with kids.
meanings.sent2: The playability of the playground equipment was evident in how much fun the children had.
meanings.sent3: The playability of the puzzle was so high that even adults couldn't resist trying to solve it.
meanings.sent4: Her natural talent for music gave her a playability on the piano that was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The playability of the soccer field was so inviting that even those who never played before wanted to join in.

meanings.definition: The ease with which something can be played or used.
meanings.sent1: The playability of the video game was so simple that even beginners could enjoy it.
meanings.sent2: The playability of the app made it popular among users of all ages.
meanings.sent3: The playability of the remote control car made it a favorite toy for the kids.
